column4: hi everyone. I used to have a problem with a machine i put into standby under gnome the other day and it wouldn't start any more. The problem itself has been solved, but since then, i cannot open any locations in gnome: i keep getting error messages "folder or file not found". I also downloaded a file to the desktop with firefox, but gnome doesn't display the file there, even though firefox...
...DL manager finished without errors. What seems to be the problem here?
you forget to shut down the computer when the download is done.so that it had time to rest.
